name: Why is the Princess in a Magic Forest?!
description: Max is on an epic quest to save the legendary princess in the fabled magic forest where anything is possible. The twist? Max is the weakest hero ever to exist! Help Max reach the goal through a legion of levels, all the while having to deal with magic experiments, explosive sheep, friendzoned specters, black-holes and much much more! Why?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Storage: 1 GB available space
